About

I’m a graphic and web designer from Montreal, Canada. My design philosophy combines simplicity with polish and style. I take great satisfaction from creating products that look great and get results.

Currently a designer at Foodtastic.

Also available for freelance work.

My Story

My interest in graphic design, animation and coding began as a teenager. Since the beginning I have been interested in art and technology, which pulled me into this field. I studied graphic and web design at John Abbott College (graduating on the dean’s list) meanwhile taking on my first freelance projects. After graduation I started working full time as an in-house graphic designer at restaurant franchising company Foodtastic where I have had the opportunity to work with many brands on numerous marketing campaigns. Using design solutions for packaging, print and digital design I create compelling experiences with the goal of increasing brand recognition and boosting sales and conversions.

I now have over 5 years of experience working and studying in the graphic and web design field, and am continuing to grow experience my skillset.
